title: Restore UI to the previous version (rollback recent blinking/color changes)

requirements.text: Remove the recently introduced "live blink" icon animation across the site by eliminating usage of the `icon-live-blink-2s` class and removing (or disabling) the corresponding CSS animation so icons no longer blink.

acceptanceCriteria: No icons blink anywhere in the UI (including scheme cards, header IT 2.0 icon, gallery icon, and floating buttons).
`icon-live-blink-2s` is no longer applied in React components, and the animation does not run in the browser.

requirements.text: Restore headings to their previous styling by removing the `heading-primary-live` class wherever applied and removing (or disabling) its CSS so headings are no longer forced to dark red and do not blink.

acceptanceCriteria: Section titles and modal titles do not blink.
Headings are not forced to the special dark-red heading color introduced by `heading-primary-live` and instead follow the base heading styles.

requirements.text: Restore modal/overlay close (X) buttons to their previous appearance by removing the `close-x-live-blink-3s` class from all close icons and removing (or disabling) its CSS so close icons are not forced red and do not blink.

acceptanceCriteria: Close (X) icons in all dialogs/modals/lightboxes do not blink.
Close (X) icons are not forced to the special red color introduced by `close-x-live-blink-3s`.

requirements.text: Audit and revert any other visual changes introduced specifically to support the new blinking/color update set (including any helper classes added only for that update) so the site matches the look and behavior of the pre-change version.

acceptanceCriteria: There are no remaining references to the rollbacked blink/color utilities in `frontend/src` (including CSS and component classNames).
The UI has no new blink-based effects compared to the previous version and behaves normally under `prefers-reduced-motion` (no special-casing needed for removed effects).

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only UI components must be composed, not modified).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrap files: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`.
Backend must remain single-actor; do not add additional canisters/services.
nonGoals: Adding new animations or additional visual effects.
Introducing new features or changing site content/structure beyond rolling back the recent blinking/color-related changes.
Backend changes (no Motoko logic changes required for this rollback).
